job_tasks.phrase: craft the infrastructure, libraries and tooling to support data ingestion, processing, monitoring and lineage at DeepL.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core software engineering task of building and maintaining the infrastructure, libraries, and tools that enable data operations.

job_tasks.phrase: make them available to our stakeholders company-wide: Developers, Product Development, Data Science and Management.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the integration aspect of making data accessible to various user groups within the company, a typical software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: provide support at all stages of the data lifecycle to ensure that users can access the data they need to make data-driven decisions and to provide a framework for high data quality and transparent data security.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the engineering responsibility for ensuring data accessibility and quality, which falls under the umbrella of software development and system maintenance.

job_tasks.phrase: Administer Kafka clusters that play a central role for data exchange in the company
job_tasks.justification: Administering Kafka clusters is a core operational task for managing data infrastructure and ensuring smooth data exchange.

job_tasks.phrase: Set up and maintain third party tools in Kubernetes that are used for data visualization, discovery and lineage
job_tasks.justification: Setting up and maintaining tools within Kubernetes is a direct MLOps/DevOps task focused on infrastructure operations.

job_tasks.phrase: Monitoring in Prometheus and Grafana - you build and set up solutions that make sure our systems are operating smoothly
job_tasks.justification: Building and setting up monitoring solutions using Prometheus and Grafana is a key aspect of system operations and reliability.

job_tasks.phrase: Help improve our CI/CD framework for reliable builds and deployments
job_tasks.justification: Improving CI/CD frameworks is a fundamental task within operations and MLOps for ensuring efficient and reliable software delivery.

job_tasks.phrase: Write tools and services in Go and Python
job_tasks.justification: Writing tools and services in specific programming languages is a core software development activity.

soft_skills.justification: Implies working within a team of engineers.

soft_skills.phrase: make them available to our stakeholders company-wide: Developers, Product Development, Data Science and Management.
soft_skills.justification: Indicates a need to communicate and provide services to various internal stakeholders.

soft_skills.phrase: Diverse and internationally distributed team: joining our team means becoming part of a large, global community with people of more than 90 nationalities.
soft_skills.justification: Highlights the diverse and international nature of the team, requiring strong collaboration skills.

soft_skills.phrase: Open communication, regular feedback: as a language-focused company, we value the importance of clear, honest communication. We value smooth collaboration, direct and actionable feedback, and believe that leading with empathy makes us better together.
soft_skills.justification: Explicitly states the importance of open communication, feedback, and collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: Annual learning budget: because we never stop learning, we've set up an annual budget for your professional development-pick a learning path which contributes to your career development and we'll back you up.
soft_skills.justification: Indicates a strong emphasis on continuous learning and professional development.

soft_skills.phrase: Monthly full-day hacking sessions: every month, we have Hack Fridays, where you can spend your time diving into a project you're passionate about and get the opportunity to work with other teams-we value your initiatives, impact, and creativity.
soft_skills.justification: The mention of 'hacking sessions' and valuing 'initiatives, impact, and creativity' points towards innovation and ownership.

soft_skills.phrase: Remote work, flexible hours: ... all in sync with your team's general locations and time zones to foster effective and seamless collaboration.
soft_skills.justification: Emphasizes the need for effective collaboration despite remote work, requiring good communication and coordination.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses entirely on infrastructure engineering, data platform automation, and the development of tools and services for data ingestion, processing, and monitoring. There is no mention of AI/ML model development, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, or generative AI specific tasks. The core responsibilities align with traditional software engineering and MLOps/DevOps practices, fitting the 'Software Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and specific about the responsibilities and technologies involved. It clearly defines an infrastructure and data platform role, with no indication of AI/ML model development or generative AI focus, making the profile assignment straightforward and highly confident.
